data.comment: The big names in today's match at Griffin Park have now been confirmed.
Brentford kick-off the first half - the match is underway!
In the minute 8, Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Ivan Toney.
Mathias Jensen is replacing Christian Norgaard for the home team.
It's now 2-0 in London as Ivan Toney scores for Brentford.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second half is underway in London - Preston with the kick-off.
Goal! Preston reduce the deficit to 2-1 through Scott Sinclair.
In the minute 60, Goal! Scott Sinclair levels the match at 2-2.
Brad Potts scores to make it 2-3 at Griffin Park.
The home team replace Emiliano Marcondes with Said Benrahma.
In the minute 68, Thomas Frank (Brentford) is making a third substitution, with Saman Ghoddos replacing Sergi Canos.
Great finish from Sean Maguire to give Preston a 2-4 lead.
Preston make their first substitution with Emil Riis Jakobsen replacing Sean Maguire.
The match is over. Final score 2-4.
